actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Joint resolution to enable the United States to organize and hold an international conference in the United States in fiscal year 1974 and authorize an appropriation therefor.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to take all necessary steps to organize and hold an international conference on heart disease, cancer, and stroke in Washington, D.C. in the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, and to report to the Congress on the proceedings and outcome of such a conference. Authorizes appropriations of up to $5,000,000 for the purpose of defraying expenses incident to organizing and holding the conference.

titles.title: Joint resolution to enable the United States to organize and hold an international conference in the United States in fiscal year 1974 and authorize an appropriation therefor.
